tetra.general.geodegenerate.tooltip: Toggle off to disable generation of geodes. Already generated chunks may still contain geodes. §oRequires restart.§r
tetra.general.generatefeatures.tooltip: Enables generation of terrain features such as ancient ruins. Will not remove already generated features when disabled. §oRequires restart.§r
tetra.general.maxfeaturedepth.tooltip: Used to limit how deep the feature generator will recurse into feature children, helps to avoid recursive loops and cascading worldgen in 3d-party generation features.
tetra.general.development.tooltip: Puts tetra in development mode, causing several configuration files to be reloaded continously and initializes rendering of structure helpers. Enabling will have a negative impact on performance. §oRequires restart.§r
tetra.general.moduleprogression.tooltip: Allows tetra items to "level up" after being used a certain amount of times, allowing the player to choose from different ways to "hone" 1 module on the item. Major modules also settle after some time, increasing its integrity.
tetra.general.workbenchdroptable.tooltip: Enabling cause the workbench to drop itself as an item when broken, rather than dropping the vanilla crafting bench.
tetra.general.settlelimitbase.tooltip: The base value for number of uses required for a module to settle.
tetra.general.settlelimitlevelmultiplier: Level multiplier for settling limit. A value of 3 would cause a module that has settled once to require 3x as many uses before it settles again.
tetra.general.settlelimitdurabilitymulti: Durability multiplier for settling limit. A value of 1 would cause a module with 75 durability to require an additional 75 uses before it settles.
tetra.general.honeswordbase.tooltip: The base value for number of uses required before a sword can be honed.
tetra.general.honeswordintegritymultipli: Integrity multiplier for sword honing. A value of 2 would cause a sword which uses 3 integrity to require a 2*3 times as many uses before it can be honed.
tetra.general.honeduplexbase.tooltip: The base value for number of uses required before a tool can be honed.
tetra.general.honeduplexintegritymultipl: Integrity multiplier for tool honing. A value of 2 would cause a sword which uses 3 integrity to require a 2*3 times as many uses before it can be honed.

item.journal.tooltip1: At a touch the sphere projects diagrams and glyphs onto nothingness

stats.bleeding.tooltip: 攻擊生物時有 30%% 的機率使它們以 §e%s§r 的傷害持續流血 2 秒
stats.backstab.tooltip: 從後方攻擊生物能造成 §e%s§r 的額外傷害
stats.armorPenetration.tooltip: 攻擊生物時總會造成 §e%s§r 的最低傷害，無視護甲
stats.unarmoredDamage.tooltip: 攻擊無護甲的生物時造成 §e%s§r 的額外傷害
stats.knockback.tooltip: 增加 §e%s§r 倍的擊退距離
stats.looting.tooltip: 增加殺死生物的掉落物
stats.fiery.tooltip: 攻擊生物時使它著火 §e%s§r 秒
stats.smite.tooltip: 在攻擊亡靈生物時造成 §e%s§r 的額外傷害
stats.arthropod.tooltip: 在攻擊節肢生物時造成 §e%s§r 的額外傷害並附加 1-§e%s§r 秒的 緩慢 IV 效果
stats.sweeping.tooltip: 攻擊生物時也對所有附近的敵人造成 §e%s§r 的武器傷害
stats.unbreaking.tooltip:
使用時有機率不減少耐久

§7耐久等級：§e%s§7
迴避損壞機率：§e%s%%
stats.mending.tooltip: 消耗獲得的經驗球以修覆耐久，每點經驗修覆 §e%s§r 耐久\n\n§7隻在左手或右手持有時有效
stats.silkTouch.tooltip: 破壞時掉落方塊本身，而不是一般的掉落物
stats.fortune.tooltip: 在採集或回收方塊時增加掉落機率
stats.quickStrike.tooltip: 在攻擊冷卻時將最小傷害減少到 §e%s§r
stats.softStrike.tooltip: 使用這個工具合成的物品獲得額外的耐久
stats.fierySelf.tooltip:
使用時使用者有機率著火，在寒冷群系中機率較低

stats.enderReverb.tooltip: 使用時激怒附近的終界使者，並且附近的終界使者傳送時使用者有機率被一起傳送\n\n§7基礎機率：§e%s§7
stats.toolbelt.booster.tooltip: 提供跳躍提升和強度為 §e%s§r 的有限制的飛行

item.modular.magic_capacity.label: Magic capacity
item.modular.magic_capacity.description:
The amount of magic this module may hold and how much of that capacity is in use.
The capacity may be exceeded, but working the module will cost experience and magical improvements may destabilize and cause negative effects when the item is altered.

§7Magic capacity: §e%s
§7Capacity usage: §e%s

item.modular.settle_progress.label: Settle progress
item.modular.settle_progress_gain.descri:
As the item is used this module will slowly settle into place, once settled it will provide additional integrity.

§7Progress: §e%s§7/§e%s

§7Requirement base: §e%s
§7Durability penalty: §e%s
item.modular.settle_progress_cost.descri:
As the item is used this module will slowly settle into place, once settled its integrity cost will decrease.

§7Progress: §e%s§7/§e%s

§7Requirement base: §e%s
§7Durability penalty: §e%s
item.modular.settle_full.label: Fully settled!
item.modular.settle_full_gain.descriptio: This module has fully settled, it is providing additional integrity
item.modular.settle_full_cost.descriptio: This module has fully settled, its integrity cost is reduced
item.modular.settle_full_null.label: Fully settled
item.modular.settle_full_null.descriptio: The simplicity of this module makes it easy to fit into place and it does not need to settle any further

settled.description: 為了增加用處，這個組件被固定了。這能提供額外的完整度

arrested.description: 這個組件無法被固定，它的完整度不會逐漸增加

cleanse_schema.description: Cleanse negative effects caused by magic instability.\n\nExperience cost is increased based on exceeded magic capacity and the amount of instability effects.
blade_hone_damage_1_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 I
blade_hone_damage_1_schema.description: 打磨組件，使造成的傷害增加 0.5。
blade_hone_damage_2_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 II
blade_hone_damage_2_schema.description: 進一步打磨組件的傷害增益，使傷害增益從 0.5 增加到 1。
blade_hone_damage_3_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 III

basic_blade_schema.name: 簡易劍刃
basic_blade_schema.description: 用給定的劍刃替換目前的劍刃，或者用原材料重鑄它。
sword/basic_blade.name: 劍
sword/basic_blade.description: A basic blade with average damage, attack speed and integrity usage.
basic_blade/serrated.name: 鋸齒劍刃
basic_blade/serrated.description: 攻擊能夠造成流血效果
serrated_blade_schema.name: 鋸齒
serrated_blade_schema.description: 給劍刃附上鋸齒。擁有 30%% 的機率對目標造成 4 點的、持續 2 秒的流血傷害。對亡靈類生物無效。
blade_hone_serrated_2_schema.name: 打磨：鋸齒 II
blade_hone_serrated_2_schema.description: 打磨鋸齒，增加造成的傷害到 2。
blade_hone_serrated_3_schema.name: 打磨：鋸齒 III
blade_hone_serrated_3_schema.description: 進一步打磨鋸齒，增加造成的傷害到 4。
tempered_blade_schema.name: 回火
tempered_blade_schema.description: 給劍刃附上回火，能夠極大地提升硬度。能夠無視護甲造成一半的傷害。
blade_hone_tempered_2_schema.name: 打磨：淬火 II
blade_hone_tempered_2_schema.description: 進一步淬火，增加穿透護甲的傷害量到 3。
blade_hone_tempered_3_schema.name: 打磨：淬火 III
blade_hone_tempered_3_schema.description: 進一步淬火，增加穿透護甲的傷害量到 5。
hooked_blade_schema.name: 切口之鉤
hooked_blade_schema.description: 在劍刃背刻上缺口，在攻擊敵人時能夠提供額外的傷害。從背後攻擊敵人能夠造成致命一擊。
blade_hone_hooked_2_schema.name: 打磨：鉤子 II
blade_hone_hooked_2_schema.description: 打磨鉤子，增加背刺造成的額外傷害到 75%%。
blade_hone_hooked_3_schema.name: 打磨：鉤子 III
blade_hone_hooked_3_schema.description: 進一步打磨鉤子增益，增加背刺造成的額外傷害到 125%%。
basic_hilt_schema.name: 劍柄
basic_hilt_schema.description: 用給定的劍柄替換目前的劍柄，或者用原材料重鑄它。
sword/basic_hilt.name: Simple hilt
sword/basic_hilt.description: A simple sword hilt. The sword hilt is the primary source of integrity for swords.
basic_hilt/blazing.name: 燃燒
basic_hilt/blazing.description: 你可能在使用時著火，尤其是在炎熱的環境中
basic_hilt/ender_reverb.name: 終界混響
basic_hilt/ender_reverb.description: 在附近有終界生物時產生副作用
basic_hilt/wrap_string.name: 繩裹柄
basic_hilt/wrap_string.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
basic_hilt/wrap_leather.name: 皮革裹柄
basic_hilt/wrap_leather.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
basic_hilt/wrap_hide.name: 兔皮裹柄
basic_hilt/wrap_hide.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
basic_hilt/wrap_vine.name: 藤蔓裹柄
basic_hilt/wrap_vine.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
wrap_hilt_schema.name: 裹柄
wrap_hilt_schema.description: 使用材料裹柄。輕微增加攻擊和攻速，並減少手把可能導致的負面效果。
wrap_hilt_hone_1_schema.name: 打磨：裹柄 II
wrap_hilt_hone_1_schema.description: 改良裹柄，進一步增加傷害和使用速度，並且減少負面效果。
wrap_hilt_hone_2_schema.name: 打磨：裹柄 III
wrap_hilt_hone_2_schema.description: 進一步改良裹柄，增加傷害和使用速度，並且減少負面效果。
sword/decorative_pommel.name: Decorative pommel
sword/decorative_pommel.description: A decorative pommel, it provides a small amount of durability but has no functional value.
decorative_pommel/electrum: 裝飾性琥珀金劍柄圓頭
decorative_pommel/knightmetal: 裝飾性騎士金屬劍柄圓頭
sword/makeshift_guard.name: Makeshift guard
sword/makeshift_guard.description: A sword guard, its weak construction provides little protection for the wielding hand.
wide_guard_schema.name: 寬護手
wide_guard_schema.description: 合成一個寬護手，在揮舞時候保護你的手。在主手或副手持有時候，還能夠提供額外的護甲保護。
sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
sword/wide_guard.description: a wide guard which protects the wielding hand. Provides additional armor when the sword is held in the main-hand or off-hand.
sword_socket_schema.name: 鑲嵌
sword_socket_schema.description: 在劍中鑲嵌一枚寶石，根據寶石提供不同的效果。\n\n§7無需修理。
sword/socket.name: Socket
sword/socket.description: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
sword_socket/pristine_diamond.descriptio: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.\n\nThe gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
sword_socket/pristine_emerald.descriptio: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.\n\nThe gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
sword_socket/pristine_lapis.description: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.\n\nThe gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
counterweight_schema.name: 平衡錘
counterweight_schema.description: 用平衡錘平衡劍刃。如果平衡錘與其他組件消耗了相同的完整度，能夠極大地增加攻速。如果完整度不同，則增益可能降低，如果差異巨大甚至會降低攻速。
sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
sword/counterweight.description: A counterweight attached to the bottom of the hilt. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
reinforced_fuller_schema.name: 強化附層
reinforced_fuller_schema.description: 使用指定材料對其附加強化附層。提供額外的完整度能夠降低物品損壞的機率（耐久 I），但是劍會更重，攻擊速度更慢。
sword/reinforced_fuller.name: Reinforced fuller
sword/reinforced_fuller.description: A fuller reinforcement that provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
sword_binding_schema.name: Binding
sword_binding_schema.description: Tighten the binding between the hilt and the blade by wrapping it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
sword/binding.name: Binding
sword_binding/string.description: Tightly bound strings strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/leather.description: Tightly bound leather straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/hide.description: Tightly bound hide straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/vine.description: Tightly bound vine straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/bolt.description: An adjustable bolt attaches the blade to the hilt.
sword_tweak/binding_bolt.label: Bolt tightness
sword_tweak/binding_bolt.tooltip: §eTighten§r the bolt to make the sword more stiff, increasing damage.\n§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
forefinger_ring_schema.name: 食指圓環
forefinger_ring_schema.description: 在劍柄上附加圓環，能夠有效提升控制力。攻擊速度從 20%% 提升到 40%%，同時提升最小傷害。
sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
sword/forefinger_ring.description: A ring has been attached at the top of the hilt. The ring allows for a better grip, increasing the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
grip_loop_schema.name: 控制圓圈
grip_loop_schema.description: 為劍柄添加控制圓圈。提升 2 格的橫掃之刃攻擊範圍。
sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
sword/grip_loop.description: A ring attached at the top of the hilt. The ring allows for a better grip, increasing the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
short_blade_schema.name: 短劍刃
short_blade_schema.description: 將常規劍刃替換成更短、更輕的劍刃。能夠提供更高的攻速，但是相比於普通劍刃，使用時的傷害要稍小一些。短劍刃不能使用橫掃之刃。
sword/short_blade.name: 短劍刃
sword/short_blade.description: A blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade, allows for a faster swing rate but deals slightly less damage per swing.
short_blade/jungle.name: 毒刺
short_blade/flint.name: 匕首
short_blade/iron.name: 匕首
short_blade/gold.name: 匕首
short_blade/prismarine.name: 軍刺
short_blade/copper.name: 匕首
short_blade/tin.name: 匕首
short_blade/silver.name: 匕首
short_blade/nickel.name: 匕首
short_blade/lead.name: 匕首
short_blade/bronze.name: 匕首
short_blade/electrum.name: 匕首
short_blade/steel.name: 匕首
short_blade/thaumium.name: 匕首
short_blade/ironwood.name: 匕首
short_blade/steeleaf.name: 匕首
short_blade/fierymetal.name: 匕首
short_blade/knightmetal.name: 匕首
short_blade/hooked.name: 鉤狀劍刃
short_blade/hooked.description: 從後方擊打敵人，造成致命一擊
short_blade/tempered.name: 回火點
short_blade/serrated.name: 鋸齒劍刃
short_blade/serrated.description: 攻擊能夠造成流血效果
heavy_blade_schema.name: 重型劍刃
heavy_blade_schema.description: 將目前劍刃替換為大又重的劍刃。犧牲了速度，而換取了攻擊傷害。完全冷卻情況下能夠打出強有力的橫掃之刃。
sword/heavy_blade.name: 大劍
sword/heavy_blade.description: A large and hefty blade that sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
heavy_blade/crushing.name: 粉碎
heavy_blade/stone.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/granite.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/diorite.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/andesite.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/copper.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/tin.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/silver.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/nickel.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/lead.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/bronze.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/electrum.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/steel.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/thaumium.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/ironwood.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/steeleaf.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/fierymetal.name: 劈刀
heavy_blade/knightmetal.name: 劈刀
machete_schema.name: 彎刀
machete_schema.description: 將劍刃替換為先前材料鍛造的彎刀，能夠砍掉一大片區域內的植物。彎刀和大部分工具工作方式都不太相同，能夠瞬間採掘方塊，但是冷卻時間搖擺不定。
sword/machete.name: 彎刀
sword/machete.description: A machete which can be used to cut down plants in an area, it deals average damage and has an average attack speed.\n\nThe machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
duplex_head_hone_durability_1_schema.des: 打磨組件，增加提供的耐久 4%%。
duplex_head_hone_durability_2_schema.des: 進一步打磨組件的耐久增益，使耐久增益從 4%% 增加到 9%%。
duplex_head_hone_durability_3_schema.des: 進一步打磨組件的耐久增益，使耐久增益從 9%% 增加到 13%%。
duplex_head_hone_durability_4_schema.des: 進一步打磨組件的耐久增益，使耐久增益從 13%% 增加到 18%%。
duplex_head_hone_durability_5_schema.des: 進一步打磨組件的耐久增益，使耐久增益從 18%% 增加到 22%%。
hone/durability.name: 打磨：耐久
duplex_head_hone_speed_1_schema.name: 打磨：速度 I
duplex_head_hone_speed_1_schema.descript: 打磨組件，使總體使用速度增加 0.03。
duplex_head_hone_speed_2_schema.name: 打磨：速度 II
duplex_head_hone_speed_2_schema.descript: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 0.03 增加到 0.07。
duplex_head_hone_speed_3_schema.name: 打磨：速度 III
duplex_head_hone_speed_3_schema.descript: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 0.07 增加到 0.1。
duplex_head_hone_speed_4_schema.name: 打磨：速度 IV
duplex_head_hone_speed_4_schema.descript: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 0.1 增加到 0.14。
duplex_head_hone_speed_5_schema.name: 打磨：速度 V
duplex_head_hone_speed_5_schema.descript: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 0.14 增加到 0.17。
hone/speed.name: 打磨：速度
duplex_hone_damage_flat_1_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 I
duplex_hone_damage_flat_1_schema.descrip: 打磨組件，使造成的傷害增加 0.5。
duplex_hone_damage_flat_2_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 II
duplex_hone_damage_flat_2_schema.descrip: 進一步打磨組件的傷害增益，使傷害增益從 0.5 增加到 1。
duplex_hone_damage_flat_3_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 III
duplex_hone_damage_flat_3_schema.descrip: 進一步打磨組件的傷害增益，使傷害增益從 1 增加到 1.5。
duplex_hone_damage_flat_4_schema.name: 打磨：傷害IV
duplex_hone_damage_flat_4_schema.descrip: 進一步打磨組件的傷害增益，使傷害增益從 1.5 增加到 2。
duplex_hone_damage_flat_5_schema.name: 打磨：傷害 V
duplex_hone_damage_flat_5_schema.descrip: 進一步打磨組件的傷害增益，使傷害增益從 2 增加到 3。
hone/damage.name: 打磨：傷害
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_1_schema.name: 打磨：砍伐效率 I
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_1_schema.desc: 打磨組件，使砍伐的效率增加 1。
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_2_schema.name: 打磨：砍伐效率 II
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_2_schema.desc: 進一步打磨組件的砍伐效率增益，使砍伐的效率從 1 增加到 2.5。
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_3_schema.name: 打磨：砍伐效率 III
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_3_schema.desc: 進一步打磨組件的砍伐效率增益，使砍伐的效率從 2.5 增加到 5。
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_4_schema.name: 打磨：砍伐效率 IV
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_4_schema.desc: 進一步打磨組件的砍伐效率增益，使砍伐的效率從 5 增加到 10。
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_5_schema.name: 打磨：砍伐效率 V
duplex_hone_axe_efficiency_5_schema.desc: 進一步打磨組件的砍伐效率增益，使砍伐的效率從 10 增加到 15。
hone/axe_efficiency.name: 打磨：砍伐效率
duplex_hone_axe_tier_1_schema.name: 打磨：砍伐等級 I
duplex_hone_axe_tier_1_schema.descriptio: 打磨組件，使砍伐等級增加 1。
hone/axe_tier.name: 打磨：砍伐等級
duplex_hone_shovel_efficiency_1_schema.d: 打磨組件，使挖土的效率增加 1。
duplex_hone_shovel_efficiency_2_schema.d: 進一步打磨組件的挖土效率增益，使挖土的效率從 1 增加到 2.5。
duplex_hone_shovel_efficiency_3_schema.d: 進一步打磨組件的挖土效率增益，使挖土的效率從 2.5 增加到 5。
duplex_hone_shovel_efficiency_4_schema.d: 進一步打磨組件的挖土效率增益，使挖土的效率從 5 增加到 10。
duplex_hone_shovel_efficiency_5_schema.d: 進一步打磨組件的挖土效率增益，使挖土的效率從 10 增加到 15。
hone/shovel_efficiency.name: 打磨：挖土效率
duplex_hone_shovel_tier_1_schema.name: 打磨：挖掘等級 I
duplex_hone_shovel_tier_1_schema.descrip: 打磨組件，增加挖掘等級 1。
hone/shovel_tier.name: 打磨：挖掘等級
打磨組件，使挖掘效率增加 1。
進一步打磨組件的挖掘效率增益，使挖掘效率從 1 增加到 2.5。
進一步打磨組件的挖掘效率增益，使挖掘效率從 2.5 增加到 5。

basic_handle_schema.name: 工具手把
basic_handle_schema.description: 堅固的手把能夠支持更重、更高級的工具頭。
duplex/basic_handle.name: Basic handle
duplex/basic_handle.description: A basic tool handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity for tools.
basic_handle/blazing.name: 燃燒
basic_handle/blazing.description: 你可能在使用時著火，尤其是在炎熱的環境中。
basic_handle/ender_reverb.name: 終界混響
basic_handle/ender_reverb.description: 在附近有終界生物時產生副作用。
basic_handle/wrap_string.name: 繩裹柄
basic_handle/wrap_string.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
basic_handle/wrap_leather.name: 皮革裹柄
basic_handle/wrap_leather.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
basic_handle/wrap_hide.name: 兔皮裹柄
basic_handle/wrap_hide.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
basic_handle/wrap_vine.name: 藤蔓裹柄
basic_handle/wrap_vine.description: 輕微增加攻擊和攻速，減少手把負面效果。
wrap_handle_schema.name: 裹柄
wrap_handle_schema.description: 使用材料裹柄。輕微增加攻擊和攻速，並減少手把可能導致的負面效果。
wrap_handle_hone_1_schema.name: 打磨：裹柄 II
wrap_handle_hone_1_schema.description: 改良裹柄，進一步增加傷害和使用速度，並且減少負面效果。
wrap_handle_hone_2_schema.name: 打磨：裹柄 III
wrap_handle_hone_2_schema.description: 進一步改良裹柄，進一步增加傷害和使用速度，並且減少負面效果。
handle_hone_speed_1_schema.name: 打磨：速度 I
handle_hone_speed_1_schema.description: 打磨手把，使總體使用速度增加 4%%。
handle_hone_speed_2_schema.name: 打磨：速度 II
handle_hone_speed_2_schema.description: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 4%% 增加到 9%%。
handle_hone_speed_3_schema.name: 打磨：速度 III
handle_hone_speed_3_schema.description: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 9%% 增加到 13%%。
handle_hone_speed_4_schema.name: 打磨：速度 IV
handle_hone_speed_4_schema.description: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 13%% 增加到 18%%。
handle_hone_speed_5_schema.name: 打磨：速度 V
handle_hone_speed_5_schema.description: 進一步打磨組件的使用速度增益，使速度增益從 18%% 增加到 22%%。
duplex_socket_schema.name: 鑲嵌
duplex_socket_schema.description: 在工具中鑲嵌一枚寶石，根據寶石提供不同的效果。\n\n§7無需修理。
duplex/socket.name: Socket
duplex/socket.description: A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
duplex_socket/pristine_diamond.descripti: A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tools wielder.\n\nThe gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
duplex_socket/pristine_emerald.descripti: A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tools wielder.\n\nThe gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
duplex_socket/pristine_lapis.description: A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tools wielder.\n\nThe gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
duplex_binding_schema.name: Binding
duplex_binding_schema.description: Bind the tool head to the handle by binding it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
duplex/binding.name: Binding
duplex_binding/string.description: Tightly bound strings strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/leather.description: Tightly bound leather straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/hide.description: Tightly bound hide straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/vine.description: Tightly bound vine straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/bolt.description: An adjustable bolt attaches the tool head to the handle.
duplex_tweak/binding_bolt.label: Bolt tightness
duplex_tweak/binding_bolt.tooltip: §eTighten§r the bolt to make the tool more rigid, increasing gathering efficiency.\n§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
basic_axe_schema.name: 斧
basic_axe_schema.description: 用給定材料鍛造的斧。斧能夠砍伐東西。\n\n雙斧能夠提供協同增益。
duplex/basic_axe.name: Axe head
duplex/basic_axe.description: A basic axe head that can be used for chopping things.\n\nDouble axe heads provide synergy bonuses.
basic_axe/severing.name: 切斷
basic_axe/severing.description: 對未裝備護甲的目標造成額外傷害
basic_axe/oak.name: 斧
basic_axe/cobblestone.name: 斧
basic_axe/flint.name: 斧
basic_axe/iron.name: 斧

basic_axe/steel.name: 斧
basic_axe/thaumium.name: 斧
basic_axe/ironwood.name: 斧
basic_axe/steeleaf.name: 斧
basic_axe/fierymetal.name: 斧
basic_axe/knightmetal.name: 斧
basic_pickaxe_schema.name: 鎬
basic_pickaxe_schema.description: 用給定的材料鍛造鎬。\n\n雙鎬頭能夠提供增益效果。
duplex/basic_pickaxe.name: Pickaxe head
duplex/basic_pickaxe.description: A basic pickaxe head that can be used for mining.\n\nDouble pickaxe heads may provide synergy bonuses.
basic_pickaxe/smelting.name: 冶煉
basic_pickaxe/smelting.description: [未實裝]自動冶煉破壞的方塊
basic_pickaxe/puncturing.name: 刺穿
basic_pickaxe/oak.name: 鎬
basic_pickaxe/cobblestone.name: 鎬
basic_pickaxe/flint.name: 鎬
basic_pickaxe/iron.name: 鎬
basic_pickaxe/diamond.name: 鎬
basic_pickaxe/gold.name: 鎬

butt_schema.name: 工具尾部
butt_schema.description: 用於單面工具的尾部，比雙面工具更輕。如果用堅固的材料製作，甚至有時能夠拿來做錘子。
duplex/butt.name: Tool butt
duplex/butt.description: The back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided head.
basic_hammer_schema.name: 錘
basic_hammer_schema.description: 用給定的材料鍛造錘。錘子有助於升級其他東西。\n\n雙錘頭能夠提供增益效果。
duplex/basic_hammer.name: Hammer head
duplex/basic_hammer.description: The hammer head can be used when crafting modular items, and is sometimes used for salvaging.\n\nDouble hammer heads may provide synergy bonuses.
adze_schema.name: 扁斧
adze_schema.description: 用給定的材料鍛造扁斧，扁斧是砍伐和挖掘的兩用工具。
duplex/adze.name: Adze head
duplex/adze.description: A hefty arched blade at right angles to the handle. The adze can primarily be used for digging but can also be used for cutting wood.
adze/oak.name: 扁斧
adze/cobblestone.name: 扁斧
adze/flint.name: 扁斧

adze/steeleaf.name: 扁斧
adze/fierymetal.name: 扁斧
adze/knightmetal.name: 扁斧
claw_schema.name: 羊角頭
claw_schema.description: 使用材料製作一個羊角頭。羊角頭可以用於撬開物品和快速破壞木質方塊。
duplex/claw.name: Claw
duplex/claw.description: A slightly curved claw that can be used for prying things open, and can quickly break most wooden blocks.
claw/oak.name: 羊角錘
claw/cobblestone.name: 羊角錘
claw/flint.name: 羊角錘
claw/iron.name: 羊角錘

claw/knightmetal.name: 羊角錘
hoe_schema.name: 鋤
hoe_schema.description: 用給定材料鍛造鋤，鋤能夠用於耕地。
duplex/hoe.name: Hoe
duplex/hoe.description: A basic hoe, useful for tilling soil.
hoe/oak.name: 鋤
hoe/cobblestone.name: 鋤
hoe/flint.name: 鋤
hoe/iron.name: 鋤
hoe/diamond.name: 鋤

hoe/fierymetal.name: 鋤
hoe/knightmetal.name: 鋤
sickle_schema.name: 鐮刀
sickle_schema.description: 用給定材料鍛造鐮刀，能夠在大片區域內切割方塊。這個工具和其他工具稍有不同，能夠瞬間採掘方塊，但是冷卻時間搖擺不定。
duplex/sickle.name: Sickle
duplex/sickle.description: A slightly arched sickle which can be used to cut blocks in an area.\n\nWorks different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
sickle/oak.name: 鐮刀
sickle/cobblestone.name: 鐮刀
sickle/flint.name: 鐮刀
sickle/iron.name: 鐮刀

toolbelt.blocked: 物品欄已滿，請先騰出一些空間來
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.quick.quickAcces: A suitable tool can be quickly drawn from this slot
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.quiver.quickAcce: 箭可以從這一格被直接取出
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.storage.quickAcc: 物品可以被重裝入這一格
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.storage.cellSock: 模組可以從這個位置中的電池中獲取電
toolbelt_belt0.name: 羊毛腰帶
toolbelt_belt0.description: 繩子和皮革碎片被證明是方便使用工具的好材料，但是繩子缺乏支撐附加工具的能力。用毛線編織腰帶，應該比簡單地繫上腰帶相比，能提供更好的支撐。
toolbelt_belt1.name: 皮革腰帶
toolbelt_belt1.description: 使用適當的工具，你應該能夠將皮革切成長條帶，這應該比用羊毛製成的腰帶更強。
toolbelt_belt2.name: 腰帶扣
toolbelt_belt2.description: 扣子與打結相比，能夠為腰部的東西提供更多的支撐。
toolbelt_belt3.name: 鑲飾潛影貝
toolbelt_belt3.description: 潛影殼在攜帶箱子時，可謂是完美的支撐材料，將潛影殼鑲飾在腰帶上可以進一步提高它的完整度。
toolbelt/belt.name: 工具帶
belt/rope.name: 繩子
belt/rope.description: A very basic waistband fashioned from a rope. Can hold a very limited amount of attachments.
belt/sash.name: 羊毛腰帶
belt/sash.description: A woolen sash that can hold a small amount of attachments.
belt/leather.name: 腰帶
belt/leather.description: A sturdy leather strap that can be wrapped around ones waist. Can hold a decent amount of attachments.
belt/buckled.name: Leather belt
belt/buckled.description: A sturdy leather belt, locked in place with a buckle. Can hold a large amount of attachments.
belt/inlaid.name: Shulker inlaid belt
belt/inlaid.description: A sturdy leather belt that has been inlaid with shulker shells. Can hold an impressive amount of attachments.
strap_schema1.name: 單層皮帶
strap_schema1.description: 為腰帶附加單層皮帶，能夠快速攜帶、訪問工具或者其他物品。
strap_schema2.name: 雙層皮帶
strap_schema2.description: 為腰帶附加兩層皮帶，能夠快速攜帶、訪問工具或者其他物品。
strap_schema3.name: 三層皮帶
strap_schema3.description: 為腰帶附加三層皮帶，能夠快速攜帶、訪問工具或者其他物品。
strap_schema4.name: 四層皮帶
strap_schema4.description: 為腰帶附加四層皮帶，能夠快速攜帶、訪問工具或者其他物品。
strap1/leather.name: Leather strap
strap1/leather.description: A leather strap that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
strap1/iron.name: Iron loop
strap1/iron.description: An iron loop that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
strap2/leather.name: 2 Leather straps
strap2/leather.description: Two leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap2/iron.name: 2 Iron loops
strap2/iron.description: Two iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap3/leather.name: 3 Leather straps
strap3/leather.description: Three leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap3/iron.name: 3 Iron loops
strap3/iron.description: Three iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap4/leather.name: 4 Leather straps
strap4/leather.description: Four leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap4/iron.name: 4 Iron loops
strap4/iron.description: Four iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
potion_storage_schema.name: 藥水包
potion_storage_schema.description: 附加上專門用來裝藥水的小袋子。袋子能夠儲存大量藥水，但只能支持一小組不同類型的藥水
toolbelt/potion_storage.name: Potion bag
toolbelt/potion_storage.description: A small bag specifically designed for carrying potions. The bag stores a large amount of potions, but can only support a small set of different types of potions.
storage_schema.name: 儲存袋
storage_schema.description: 把一個小袋子附在工具帶上，能夠儲存大量的物品。雖然袋子裡的物品不容易訪問，但是持有的物品可以像其他工具帶附件一樣容易地儲存到袋子裡。
toolbelt/storage.name: Storage pouch
toolbelt/storage.description: A small pouch which can store a decent amount of items. The contents of the pouch are not available using the toolbelt's quick access functionality.
quiver_schema.name: 箭袋
quiver_schema.description: 將箭袋裝到工具帶上。箭袋可以容納大量弓箭。
toolbelt/quiver.name: Quiver
toolbelt/quiver.description: A quiver that can hold a large amount of arrows.
booster_schema.name: 助推
booster_schema.description: 附加一個助推單元，能夠跳躍很遠的距離，甚至短時間進行飛行。在跳躍前蹲下，或在空中跳躍，亦或用鞘翅飛行進行啟用。§o以火藥為燃料。
toolbelt/booster.name: Booster
toolbelt/booster.description: A booster unit which grants the ability to jump long distances or even fly for shorter periods of time. Activate by crouching before a jump, or by jumping mid air or while flying with an elytra. §oUses gunpowder from toolbelt inventories as fuel.
strap_quickslot_schema.name: 快卸銷
strap_quickslot_schema.description: 使用快卸銷鎖住皮帶，能夠快速取得皮帶上的工具。\n\n§7按下快速訪問快捷鍵，嘗試裝備第一個適合破壞面對方塊的工具。工具只能從裝有這個升級的格子裡取得。
strap/quick_latch.name: 快卸銷
strap/quick_latch.description: 按下工具帶快捷鍵能夠從物品欄快速裝備最合適的工具。
quiver_quickslot_schema.name: 快卸銷
quiver_quickslot_schema.description: 用快卸銷升級箭袋，能夠快速獲取箭袋中的箭。\n\n§7會自動在拉弓但沒有箭時從箭袋的第一格獲取一枝箭。
quiver/quick_latch.name: 快卸銷
quiver/quick_latch.description: 在沒有箭時自動從這個箭袋中獲取箭。
storage_quickslot_schema.name: 快卸銷
storage_quickslot_schema.description: 使用快卸銷升級儲存袋，更容易向內儲存物品。\n\n§7手中物品可以通過重裝快捷鍵被放入袋中。
storage/quick_latch.name: 快卸銷
storage/quick_latch.description: 手中物品可以透過重裝快捷鍵被放入儲存袋中。
